reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan lightweight and perfect for summer, with a soft material that fits well and looks nice.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Stylish and Cozy Must-Have – The Perfect Color Block Cardigan!
items.body: Absolutely loving my new color block cardigan! It’s the perfect addition to my wardrobe for this season. The mix of colors is vibrant yet sophisticated, making it easy to pair with almost anything. The quality is top-notch—super soft, warm, and not too bulky, so it's perfect for layering. I appreciate that it’s stylish without being overly trendy, so it feels timeless. The fit is also fantastic. It's slightly oversized, which gives it a cozy, relaxed vibe without feeling too slouchy. I’ve received so many compliments every time I wear it, and it's become my go-to piece for casual days or even when I need to dress up a bit. If you're looking for a cardigan that's both comfortable and chic, this one is definitely worth it! Highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: StreeterK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect summer topper
items.body: This is just what I was looking for! A lightweight, soft and flowy top that is perfect for summer. Very soft, not heavy. This is going to look great with white jeans or a white denim skirt, or really goes with anything! Perfect for a summer evening when you get a bit of a chill when the sun goes down. It looks just like the picture. This can be dressed up or down, according to your mood. It’s a very versatile piece, perfect to throw in a suitcase with no worries about wrinkles. I usually wear a Large (12-14) in tops, and this fits perfectly. Nicely loose and flowy. Read more
items.author: Lucky Lucy 23

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, soft cardigan
items.body: Ordered this in navy and royal blue. Colors are as described. Jacket is soft, lightweight and provides coverage without being too warm. XL size is a good fit (5’7”, 195lbs) - sleeves not tight and length draped nicely. This jacket also launders well (cool water, low tumble dry). My only dilemma is I find myself fidgeting with the rolled collar to get it to lay right. Overall, it’s a great value and packs well so I’m happy with it. Read more
items.author: Connie P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and comfortable
items.body: Great sweater, perfect fit. Wonderful to have when cooler temperatures come to FL Read more
items.author: palm harbor s

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect length sweater to wear with pants.
items.body: This sweater is just light enough to be able to wear when the weather is not winter yet, but the temps have dropped. I like that it's longer and looks good with pants. I have a larger lower section, and this covers that up comfortably. The red is such a pretty red. I wore it with white jeans and a white tee shirt and got a lot of compliments. Read more
items.author: JK

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, but itchy material.
items.body: Looks nice—Hangs nicely and is true to size. Washability is good. My complaint is that the fabric is itchy even through another shirt. I also like to wear a camisole under my sweaters, but this sweater is too itchy to do that. Read more
items.author: Placeholder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect light jacket/sweater
items.body: I absolutely love this light jacket! The fabric is very nice. It is a soft jersey knit with a very nice drape and it’s a perfect weight when you need a little something warmer than a shirt alone. I wear mine to work all the time and it is holding up beautifully. It runs true to size. I highly recommend this! Read more
items.author: Imglad4you

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Liked first so much, I ordered another.
items.body: This was my second order of this cardigan. I liked the first, and it washed well, plus fit nicely. Saw this print and ordered it, and again, am very happy with it. Easy care, doesn't wrinkle, nicely make, and reasonable price. Read more
items.author: Linda K Rogers

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black-charcoal Gray, Blue, Dark Pink, Apricot, Black, Navy Blue, Charcoal Gray, Red, White, Floral White, Khaki-apricot, Floral Bohe, Floral White Pink, Light Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
